The Changzhi Huangshan Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in Niupeng Village, Huangshan Township, Huguan County, Changzhi City

operators: Shanxi Coal Transportation and Marketing Group Huangshan Coal Industry Company
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Shanxi Coal Transportation and Marketing Group and owned by Jinneng Group.
